install.name: What's New
install.author: HUBzero
install.copyright: Copyright 2005-2011 Purdue University. All rights reserved.
install.description: Lists the newest resources and events on the site.

param.name: cssId
param.label: Module ID
param.description: An ID to be applied to the css of the module container, this allows individual module styling

param.name: limit
param.label: Number of entries
param.description: The number of entries to display.

param.name: feed
param.label: Feed link
param.description: Select whether to display a feed link

param.name: period
param.label: category:period
param.description: Time period and category to pull results for.

param.name: tagged
param.label: Show My Interests
param.description: Display whats new by the tags the user has listed as their interests.

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is re-cached
